entry.title: Upgrade Linux mint16 to Linux mint 17 Qiana
entry.content:
Linux mint 17 -Qiana released with Cinnamon or Mate Desktop Environment.

And I was using Min16 to write this article.

And the dist-upgrade is running.

But how to upgrade the linux mint to a newer version.

1 Backup Your Files

This a very important step, although I did not back up my files. Cause I did not have a hardisk or webdrive with enough space.

And back your source like these:

$ sudo cp /etc/apt/sources.list  /etc/apt/sources.list.bak
$ sudo cp /etc/apt/sources.list.d/official-package-repositories.list  /etc/apt/sources.list.d/official-package-repositories.list.bak

2 Change your source

Just replace petra with qiana and saucy with trusty

3 Upgrade

$ sudo apt-get update
$ sudo apt-get dist-upgrade
$ sudo apt-get upgrade

This is all.

And maybe you want to read this post too— Upgrade Linux mint

There is a lot of games supporting linux. You can get the list.

Tetris—Quadrapassel

For example, when you need a square, it will never give you a square.

This is a very good design, and hard to play, hard to get high scores.

Chromium BSU

It has the same name with browser chromium.

Just control a space ship to shoot the enemies. But still very difficult.

Tetris 3D— Blockout2

It is a 3d tetris game. More difficult than 2d tetris.

But the difficult is not like Quadrapassel.

entry.title: I did a fool thing
entry.content:
In octopress/source/_post .I run a command—

rm *.markdown*

I want to run

rm *.markdown~

to delete some old autobacked files.

But I typed wrong word and run it immedittely.

So all my markdown files is deleted.and _postis empty.

You know rm command do not mv files to trash.

So I find in trash to find old “octopress folder”.And I rewrite the newer articles from baham.co by hand.

It waste my time.

And it is a lesson.

And now I add _post to my deja-backup backing floder.

And maybe I need use “mv” to replace “rm”.
